name: Bloodborne inspired blockout
description:
THANKS FOR VISITING!

Hey there! this is another prototype level, this time inspired by bloodborne. 

The playable characters are "not-so" built around the same theme, just wanted to play around with mechanics I've thought may be fun to implement.  

The level works around a small town with a gigantic cathedral, which I took reference from "La Catedral de Santiago".  

Controls:

There are two playable characters. Press Tab to change between them.

Gunner:

WASD to move

LShift to sprint

C to slide while sprinting. Won't work otherwise.

LCtrl to crouch

LClick to shoot

RClick to aim

R to recharge

Swordsman:

WASD to move

LShift to sprint

C to roll. (No need to sprint)

LCtrl to crouch

LClick to attack

Space to fix an enemy // Unfix it

R to recharge
